query:
MATCH p0 = (:Base)-[:SCCM_IsMappedTo]->()
MATCH p1 = (:SCCM_AdminUser)-[:SCCM_AllPermissions|SCCM_IsAssigned]->()
RETURN p0,p1
name: SCCM Admin Users (Requires AdminService Collection w/ SCCM Admin User)
description: Display domain accounts mapped to SCCM administrative users and the roles and collections they are assigned
